title: WHERE IS TEH NURF/URF/WHERE/IS/IT
body: 8 AM AND STILL NO NUFTRENGRG, RIOTO PLZ, PLZ,PLZ,PLZ,PLZ,PLZ,PLZ

replies.body: urf should die, honestly, y rito bring back cancer and ebola in one go.
The only people that hate URF are the people that suck at it. If its to hard for you than dont play it, while the people that do like it can enjoy it.

>
> The only people that hate URF are the people that suck at it. If its to hard for you than dont play it, while the people that do like it can enjoy it.

no, the ones that hate urf are the people that frequent forums. it's fucking annoying seeing a "bring back urf it was da greatest!!1!!1" thread every fortnight.
